title: Our Tokenomics
subtitle: A transparent and sustainable token distribution, designed for long-term growth and community engagement.
keyboard_help: Use arrows to navigate, Enter to select

presale.name: Presale
presale.description: Tokens available for early project supporters.
presale.purpose: To secure funds for early development, marketing, and community building.
presale.vesting: 100% of tokens available immediately after the presale ends (TGE - Token Generation Event).

liquidity.name: Liquidity
liquidity.purpose: To enable smooth trading of the PRG token on exchanges like Raydium and Orca, which is crucial for price stability.
liquidity.vesting: 50% permanently locked in the liquidity pool. The remaining 50% released linearly over 24 months.

community_rewards.name: Community Rewards
community_rewards.description: Rewards for staking, airdrops, and activity.
community_rewards.purpose: To reward active and loyal community members for their contributions to the ecosystem's growth.
community_rewards.vesting: Released gradually through staking programs and community events over 48 months.

team.name: Team
team.description: Allocation for founders and key team members.
team.purpose: To motivate and reward the team for their long-term work on the project.
team.vesting: Tokens are locked for 12 months (cliff), then released linearly over the next 36 months.

ecosystem.name: Ecosystem Development
ecosystem.description: Funds for partnerships, game development, and integrations.
ecosystem.purpose: To finance the development of new features, Play-to-Earn games, integrations with other projects, and strategic partnerships.
ecosystem.vesting: Released based on development needs, in line with roadmap achievements.

reserves.name: Reserves & Treasury
reserves.description: Strategic reserves for the project's future needs.
reserves.purpose: To secure the project's future, fund unforeseen expenses, and allow for market intervention for stabilization purposes.
reserves.vesting: Managed by the DAO. Releasing funds requires community approval.

game_rewards.name: Game Rewards
game_rewards.vesting: Released dynamically based on player activity.

marketing.name: Marketing
marketing.description: Funds for promotion and brand building.
marketing.purpose: Global campaigns, influencer collaborations, and partnerships.

staking.name: Staking
staking.purpose: Increase network security and reduce circulating supply.
staking.vesting: Paid from the rewards pool according to schedule.
